preqs: OHS1000, PRM1001 or DGN1001 or CDS1001 or permission from Studio Coordinator.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CDS1001, DGN1001, FNA1%, PRM1001, VPR1%}

description: This is a studio based unit, where students will be presented with projects involving screenprinting processes.The unit provides students with the means to apply their technical competence in printmaking to these new processes, and to critically evaluate their works in the context of contemporary visual art.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
